text: We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #StokeOnTrent #ST1 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 12:00. Andi.
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #B78 #Tamworth area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Nottingham #NG8 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.  Siân
Update #Powercut we've got most supplies back on in #Tamworth #B78 area but are working to restore the remaining properties by approximately 09:30. Sorry for the delay. Andi.
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Tamworth #B78 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 05:00. Ellie..
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Solihull #B94 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Geraint
Update #powercut #Solihull #B94 & surrounding areas. We're sorry for the delay in restoring power, our engineers are working to have all properties back on by 21:30. Geraint
Update #powercut #Solihull #B94 & surrounding areas. We're sorry for the delay in restoring power, our engineers are working to have all properties back on by 20:00. Geraint
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Penzance #TR18 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Geraint
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Coleford #Lydbrook #GL16 #GL17 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Geraint
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Stoke #ST6 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused. Geraint
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Newport #NP20 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Geraint
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Coleford #Lybrook #GL16 #GL17 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 15:30. Andi..
We are aware that properties are without power in #Stoke #ST6 & surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 15:00. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut
Apologies for the delay in restoration at #Solihull #B94 due to the #powercut. Engineers estimate 16:00 to restore the power.

We are pleased to say power is restored at #Pontllanfraith #NP12 area. We are sorry for any disruption caused by the #powercut this morning.
We are are of a #powercut at #Pontllanfraith #NP12 and the surrounding areas. Engineers estimate 08:30 to restore the power. Sorry for any inconvenience.
Update: Apologies for the #powercut in #Newport and NP20 surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 09:00. Sorry for the delay
